problem.markdown:
Check your ability to answer some of the questions relevant to the simulation that you used.
1. The ratio of the percentage error in the discharge and percentage error in the measurement of head over a triangular notch, is
( ) 2/5 (x) 5/2 ( ) 3/2 ( ) 2/3
2. The sheet of liquid flowing over a notch is known as nappe (True or false)
( ) False (x) True
3. A submerged weir is one in which the water level on the downstream of the weir is
( ) Just at the crest level ( ) Below the crest level (x) Slightly above the crest level ( ) At the same elevation as the upstream water surface
4. Most economical section of a triangular channel is
( ) Isosceles triangle with 45o vertex angle ( ) Equilateral triangle (x) Right angled triangle with equal sides ( ) Right angled triangle
5. In a tank or channel, notch is provided to measure
( ) Velocity ( ) Pressure (x) Discharge ( ) Static energy
problem.p: Check your ability to answer some of the questions relevant to the simulation that you used.
1. The ratio of the percentage error in the discharge and percentage error in the measurement of head over a triangular notch, is
2. The sheet of liquid flowing over a notch is known as nappe (True or false)
3. A submerged weir is one in which the water level on the downstream of the weir is

choicegroup.choice: At the same elevation as the upstream water surface

problem.p: 4. Most economical section of a triangular channel is

choicegroup.choice: Right angled triangle with equal sides

problem.p: 5. In a tank or channel, notch is provided to measure
